text: (itaik kēḷviyuṟṟa aracar appeṇkaḷai aḻaittu) ‘‘nīṅkaḷ yūsuḥpai uṅkaḷ viruppattiṟkiṇaṅkumāṟu aḻaitta pōtu uṅkaḷukku ēṟpaṭṭateṉṉa?'' Eṉṟu kēṭṭār. Ataṟku appeṇkaḷ ‘‘allāh mikap paricuttamāṉavaṉ; nāṅkaḷ avariṭattil oru tīṅkaiyum aṟiyavillai'' eṉṟu kūṟiviṭṭārkaḷ. Atipatiyiṉ maṉaiviyō iccamayam uṇmai veḷippaṭṭu viṭṭatu; nāṉtāṉ avarai virumpi aḻaittēṉ. (Avar kūṟiyatil) niccayamāka avar uṇmaiyē coṉṉār'' eṉṟu kūṟiṉāḷ
